page.title: 05RELIGION
page.content: The{Christian}denominations in the area are{Roman Catholic,Anglican {Baptist,United Reformed}&{Methodist. The{Baptist}meet in the community hall {Methodists}and{United Reformed}have a joint church with extensive meeting rooms and halls.The{Anglican}church in {Church Road}is to be extended to cope with increasing congregations.The {Bishop of Oxford}has designated {Woodley}as a mission parish and there are a vicar,a deaconess and 2 curates living and working in the area.There is a thriving council of{Christians which encourages fellowship with other denominations.2 annual council functions are a{Procession of Witness on{Good Friday}and{Songs of Praise}at the beginning of carnival.Mission {Woodley}will take place in July 1986. There are no places of worship of other religions in{Woodley.
